summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of POS Car Wash System. All requested features are working correctly including: Login, POS with Cek Member flow, Inventory CRUD, Services CRUD, Customers CRUD with transaction history, Memberships management with Detail/Perpanjang/Delete, and Settings with User Management.

issues: Low Stock count shows 0 but Tire Black item shows 'Low Stock' status (8 units, min 10) - minor display inconsistency

passed_tests: Login with admin/admin123 credentials - SUCCESS
Dashboard loads with stats (Revenue, Transactions, Members, Low Stock) - SUCCESS
POS Page - Cek Member button visible and clickable - SUCCESS
POS Page - Member check dialog opens correctly - SUCCESS
POS Page - Phone number input (081234567890) and search works - SUCCESS
POS Page - Member info displayed with Tipe Membership (Monthly), Sisa Waktu (29 hari), Usage Count - SUCCESS
POS Page - Service selection dropdown for free wash works - SUCCESS
POS Page - Gunakan Membership button adds free service to cart - SUCCESS
POS Page - Cart shows Rp 0 for member subscription with crossed-out original price - SUCCESS
POS Page - Mode Member Aktif banner displays correctly - SUCCESS
POS Page - Layanan tab shows all services with categories - SUCCESS
POS Page - Produk tab works (shows empty state message) - SUCCESS
Inventory Page - Full CRUD with view, add, edit, delete buttons - SUCCESS
Inventory Page - Export Excel button present - SUCCESS
Inventory Page - Stats cards (Total Items, Low Stock, Total Nilai) - SUCCESS
Services Page - Full CRUD with edit/delete on each card - SUCCESS
Services Page - Categories (Exterior, Interior, Detailing, Polish, Coating) - SUCCESS
Services Page - Tambah Layanan button present - SUCCESS
Customers Page - Full CRUD with view, edit, delete buttons - SUCCESS
Customers Page - Search functionality present - SUCCESS
Customers Page - Export Excel button present - SUCCESS
Customers Page - View Detail shows transaction history - SUCCESS
Memberships Page - Filter buttons (Semua, Aktif, Akan Expire, Expired) - SUCCESS
Memberships Page - Detail, Perpanjang, Delete buttons on each card - SUCCESS
Memberships Page - 4 active memberships displayed correctly - SUCCESS
Memberships Page - Export Excel and Buat Membership buttons - SUCCESS
Settings Page - User Management section with 3 users - SUCCESS
Settings Page - Tambah User button present - SUCCESS
Settings Page - Edit Info, Reset Password, Delete buttons for non-owner users - SUCCESS
Settings Page - Outlet Information section displayed - SUCCESS
seed_data_creation: 4 customers with active memberships already exist in database
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features are working correctly. POS member subscription flow is fully functional - when member phone is searched, their membership info is displayed and they can get free wash (Rp 0). All CRUD operations on Inventory, Services, Customers, Memberships, and Settings pages are working. Black & Gold theme is properly implemented. UI is in Indonesian language.
